forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain this afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. WSW winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 38F. WSW winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early. Mostly sunny along with windy conditions during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds N at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early. Mostly sunny along with windy conditions during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 48F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 34F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 36F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 36F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
